favourite.article: Another old hymn songs when on Sunday school outings with my granddad.

His grace is sufficient for sickness, Sustaining and making me whole; His grace is sufficient when sorrows Like billows roll over the soul. His grace is sufficient for service, It sets us from selfishness free, And sends us to tell to the tried ones, His grace is sufficient for thee.
"Lest my poor heart should forget it", this precious song reminds me that His grace is sufficient for me, and His strength is perfected in weakness.
